about.1: I'm Wessel, a Full Stack Software Engineer passionate about turning ideas into elegant, functional, and impactful digital experiences.
about.2: With {experience} years of experience in Software Development, I take pride in being a positive addition to the team, both with a good spirit and high quality code.
